img_above_text:
![Wukong Sandgate 34.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/9/95/Wukong_Sandgate_34.jpg)
With everyone around the valley pathway defeated, be sure to look back toward that doorway we aren’t opening yet. The large ruined house has a wall with an entrance from the side the Rat Captain was on, and inside you should be able to find and absorb a green Wisp for some will and recharge your Gourd.
img_below_text:
Head up the hill checking the houses. One has a Rat Soldier waiting to ambush you in the back, as well as another green Wisp inside. Higher up past where the Rat Archers were is a larger and open building with some Licorice.
![Wukong Sandgate 36.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/5/55/Wukong_Sandgate_36.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 33 from the file 'Sandgate_Village_Walkthrough.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Sandgate 34.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/9/95/Wukong_Sandgate_34.jpg)
With everyone around the valley pathway defeated, be sure to look back toward that doorway we aren’t opening yet. The large ruined house has a wall with an entrance from the side the Rat Captain was on, and inside you should be able to find and absorb a green Wisp for some will and recharge your Gourd."
            - Following Text: "Head up the hill checking the houses. One has a Rat Soldier waiting to ambush you in the back, as well as another green Wisp inside. Higher up past where the Rat Archers were is a larger and open building with some Licorice.
![Wukong Sandgate 36.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/5/55/Wukong_Sandgate_36.jpg)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," showing the protagonist engaged in combat with a Rat Soldier inside a ruined house. This encounter occurs after defeating enemies around the valley pathway and before heading up the hill to check other houses for more enemies and items. The image serves to illustrate the ongoing exploration and combat within the game, highlighting the protagonist's journey through the Sandgate Village area.
